Name: TwinBlast_Pass

Name: TwinBlast_R

Name: Steel_Pass
Title: Unstoppable Force
Description: Steel has 15% crowd control reduction.

Title: Punch

Name: Steel_R
Title: Shield Slam
Description: Steel slams down at a targeted area, knocking up all enemies, dealing 308 <span color="#FFFFFF"> Physical Damage</> and also applying a short <span color="#FFFFFF">Stun</>.

Name: Sparrow_Pass
Title: Relentless
Description: Successive hits on the same target deal an additional 1.5 x hero level <span color="#FFFFFF"> Physical Damage</>. This effect stacks and is triggered by any damage from Sparrow.

Name: Sparrow_LMB
Title: Bow Shot
Description: Ranged basic attack dealing 39.96 <span color="#FFFFFF"> Physical Damage</>.

Name: Sparrow_RMB
Title: Piercing Shot

Name: Sparrow_Q

Name: Sparrow_E
Title: Invigorate

Name: Sparrow_R

Description: Every shot fires 3 piercing arrows in a cone for the next 10 seconds. Side arrows deal 30/60/90% of your primary attack damage.

Name: Sevarog_Pass
Title: Soul Trap
Description: Sevarog gains soul stacks that give him <span color="#FFFFFF"> Health</> when he kills an enemy with Siphon (Q). Sevarog grows in power at 20/40/60/80/ soul stacks.

Name: Sevarog_RMB

Name: Sevarog_Q
Title: Siphon
Description: Targets the area in front of him and causes 88 <span color="#FFFFFF"> Physical Damage</> to all enemies in the targeted area. Sevarog gains Soul Stacks when he gets a kill using this ability. Siphon gains Damage Bonus each time Sevarog grows from collecting souls.

Name: Sevarog_E
Title: Subjugate
Description: Sevarog targets a circle on the ground and calls down a burst of dark energy that does 55 <span color="#FFFFFF"> Physical Damage</> and applies a <span color="#FFFFFF">Root</> and then a <span color="#FFFFFF">Slow</> to any enemies hit.

Name: Sevarog_R
Title: Collosal Blow
Description: Sevarog gives one mighty swing of his hammer and deals 88 <span color="#FFFFFF"> Physical Damage</> and <span color="#FFFFFF">Knock Back</> to enemy heroes. Enemy minions will be instantly killed. Sevarog does an extra Damage Bonus each time he grows from collecting souls.

Name: Riktor_Pass
Title: Invigorate
Description: Riktor gives nearby friendly heroes a +20 <span color="#FFFFFF"> Max Movement Speed</> increase.

Name: Riktor_LMB
Title: Whip
Description: Basic melee attack dealing 49.95 <span color="#FFFFFF"> Energy Damage</>

Name: Riktor_RMB
Title: Shock Therapy
Description: Once activated, next Whip attack does 60 <span color="#FFFFFF"> Energy Damage</> and applies <span color="#FFFFFF">Silence</> and <span color="#FFFFFF">Slow</> for 1.5sec

Name: Riktor_Q

Name: Riktor_E
Title: Electrocute

Name: Riktor_R
Title: Skewer

After the <span color="#FFFFFF">Stun</> Riktor rips his Skewers out dealing more <span color="#FFFFFF"> Energy Damage</>. Total damage adds up to 308.

Name: Rampage_Pass

Name: Rampage_LMB

Name: Rampage_RMB

Name: Rampage_Q

Name: Rampage_E

Name: Rampage_R

Name: Muriel_Pass

Name: Muriel_RMB

Name: Muriel_E

Name: Muriel_R

Name: Kallari_R

Name: Grux_Pass

Name: Grim_Pass

Name: Gideon_Pass

Name: Gideon_LMB

Name: Gideon_E

Name: Gideon_R

Description: Channeled ability that slowly pulls enemies towards Gideon, dealing 450 <span color="#FFFFFF"> Energy Damage</> over 5 seconds. Gideon gains a small shield and is immune to crowd control when he is finished channeling the ability.

Name: Gadget_Pass

Name: Gadget_RMB

Name: Gadget_R

Name: FengMao_Pass
Title: The Balance
Description: Feng Mao builds stacks of offensive and defensive power through the use of his abilities. Blocking with Conversion Shield or using Reaping Dash ability will add offensive stacks for Sweep damage. Dealing damage with Sweep or using Hamstring ability will add defensive stacks for Conversion Shield. Stacks only last for a short period of time.

Name: FengMao_LMB
Title: Sweep
Description: Melee basic attack dealing 49.95 <span color="#FFFFFF"> Physical Damage</> every 1.5 sec.

Name: FengMao_RMB
Title: Conversion Shield
Description: Get a +150 <span color="#FFFFFF"> Shield</> that lasts for 2 seconds. Feng Mao generates an offensive stack for each hit he takes while Conversion Shield is active.

Name: FengMao_Q
Title: Reaping Dash
Description: Throw out an image of himself. When it collides with an enemy hero or reaches max distance, he will teleport to the image. The image deals 40 <span color="#FFFFFF"> Physical Damage</> to all minions it passes through and a single hero it collides with Feng Mao is granted an offensive stack upon use.

Name: FengMao_E
Title: Hamstring
Description: AOE attack that deals 60 <span color="#FFFFFF"> Physical Damage</> and slows enemies. Feng Mao generates a defensive stack upon use.

Name: FengMao_R
Title: Earth Shatter

Name: Dekker_LMB

Description: Ranged basic attack dealing 49.95 <span color="#FFFFFF"> Energy Damage</>.

Name: Dekker_RMB

Name: Dekker_Q

Name: Dekker_E
Title: Slow Bubble
Description: AOE bubble that slows enemies and deals 60 <span color="#FFFFFF"> Energy Damage</> once it pops.

Name: Dekker_R
Title: Containment Fence
Description: Circular fence that lasts for 5 seconds
